titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 1628) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2017.
Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 1628) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2017.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-88, by Mr. Sessions.
The rule provides for further consideration of H.R. 1628. The rule also provides that the further amendment printed Rules Committee Report 115-88 shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 39.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 275, H. Res. 254 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1628 (American Health Care Act of 2017).
